channel.title: [317] Need a tutorial on how to make... Just look [317]
channel.description:
I am using Allstar V2 (i know, alot of people say it sucks... just using it for expirimenting) but i would like to add in a clan wars. A custom clan wars where you can fight the other clan (obviously) and not lose your items. And you know what clan you are on by obtaining a cape depending on the team you are on. and you get tickets if you win. and the tickets go for rewards. Please help =P
And I would like to know how to add in pk points when you kill someone. Please help with that... that one shouldn't be to hard.
And i would like to add a custom Bounty Hunter (like pk box, just you actually get a target) and they drop what they have unless they have an item... which they will need to buy with pk points. =] please help with all of these, will include you in creditz for showing me a tutorial or making the tutorial. =]
